data.name: options
data.description: Array of options for the select input.

data.name: variant
data.description: Defines the visual style of the select input.

data.name: label
data.description: Defines the label for the select input.

data.name: floatingLabel
data.description: Enables floating label when label is used as a prop.

data.name: size
data.description: Controls the size of the select input.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Defines the border radius of the select input.

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Controls the animation speed of the select input.

data.name: helperText
data.description: Provides additional information below the select input.

data.name: labelClasses
data.description: Applies custom styles to the label.

data.name: wrapperClasses
data.description: Applies custom styles to the wrapper element.

data.name: reset
data.description: Removes all default styles, applying only user-defined styles.
